oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Lone Star Music
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising; Cowboys; Horses; Record stores; Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing Lone Star Music, the coolest music store in Texas. Poster features a woodcut of a cowboy on a horse.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bethany Primrose
